name: Youtube Dark Blue
description:
YouTube's dark theme with a darker background and blue. It also includes some other cool features!
This works with the current version of Youtube UI (2022).

(TY dark theme must be activated!)

user.name: ANILIFE
user.about: Just a weeb who likes to code >_<

additional_info:
CHANGELOG - v1.4.3 - - Bug fixes.
- v1.4.2 - - Bug fixes. - Loading bar should be blue now. - Improved player tooltip.
- v1.4 - - Some CSS variables.
- v1.3 - - Several design & speed improvements. - Transparent backgrounds. - Thumbnails with rounded borders and hover effect. - Better subtitles. - New animations. - Tahoma font for recommended videos.
- v1.2 - - Fixed minor issues. - New search bar design. - New modal design.
- v1.1 - - Fixed minor issues. - New comment section design.

COMING SOON - Youtube Studio - Settings
